testcase.classname: Test Sign Up of DemoBlaze store
testcase.name: Verify Sign Up is successful with valid information
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on sign up page.................................................passed And user enters sign up username and password...............................passed When user clicks on sign up button..........................................passed Then user is redirected to the home page....................................passed

testcase.name: Verify user can add a new item to cart
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on login page...................................................passed And user enters login username and password.................................passed When user clicks on login button............................................passed Then user is redirected to the home page....................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Item is added to cart
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on login page...................................................passed And user enters login username and password.................................passed When user clicks on login button............................................passed Then user add a new item to cart............................................passed And user verifies the item in the cart......................................passed
